body_html:
I can't reproduce. Could you put an end-to-end example together?

Here's what works for me:

import tensorflow as tf

def restore(save_path):
    checkpoint = tf.train.get_checkpoint_state(save_path)
    if checkpoint and checkpoint.model_checkpoint_path:
        print("Loading... {}".format(checkpoint.model_checkpoint_path))
    else:
        print("New Instance being created...")

tf.train.update_checkpoint_state("/tmp/", model_checkpoint_path="blah")
restore("/tmp/")

Prints:

Loading... /tmp/blah

body:
I can't reproduce. Could you put an end-to-end example together?

Here's what works for me:

import tensorflow as tf

```
def restore(save_path):
    checkpoint = tf.train.get_checkpoint_state(save_path)
    if checkpoint and checkpoint.model_checkpoint_path:
        print("Loading... {}".format(checkpoint.model_checkpoint_path))
    else:
        print("New Instance being created...")

tf.train.update_checkpoint_state("/tmp/", model_checkpoint_path="blah")
restore("/tmp/")
```

Prints:

> Loading... /tmp/blah
